abstract: Natural gas exploration has attracted several energy companies recently.
snippet: Natural gas exploration has attracted several energy companies recently.
lead_paragraph: Chevron on Tuesday became the latest energy company to set its sights on unconventional natural gas exploration, announcing that it had reached an agreement to acquire Atlas Energy for $3.2 billion.

headline.main: Chevron to Buy Atlas Energy in a Competition for Natural Gas
headline.print_headline: Chevron to Buy Atlas Energy in a Competition for Natural Gas
